aboutOrion.title: What is Orion One?
aboutOrion.p1: Orion One is a state-of-the-art surgical neuronavigation system designed specifically for veterinary medicine. It acts as a "GPS for the surgeon," allowing them to visualize the exact position of instruments in real-time on the patient's CT or MRI scans.
aboutOrion.p2: This technology transforms complex procedures into safer, faster, and minimally invasive surgeries, dramatically raising the standard of care and improving outcomes for neurosurgeries and precision orthopedics.

card1.title: Image Fusion
card1.p: Combine images from different modalities (CT, MRI) into a single view, providing a more complete and accurate picture of the patient's anatomy.

card2.title: Real-Time Tracking
card2.p: Track the exact position of your surgical instruments on the 3D model and in 2D views, ensuring precise and safe approaches.

card3.title: Advanced Planning
card3.p: Plan complex surgical approaches with millimeter precision, using intelligent segmentations that optimize the surgical outcome.

card4.title: Intuitive & Compatible Interface
card4.p: Developed with the surgeon in mind, Orion One features a clean interface and is compatible with major CT and MRI scanners on the market, facilitating seamless integration into your workflow.

card5.title: Customizable Instruments
card5.p: Easily register and calibrate your own surgical instruments, offering full flexibility to adapt to your techniques and preferences.

card6.title: Dedicated Support and Training
card6.p: Rely on our team of specialists for comprehensive training and ongoing support, ensuring you get the most out of Orion One.

step1.title: Import the Image
step1.p: Load the patient's CT or MRI scans into the system with just a few clicks.
step1.detailed_p: Import the exam easily: just drag the file onto the screen, and all views, including the patient's 3D model, will be loaded instantly.

step2.title: Plan the Surgery
step2.p: Use the 3D model to define trajectories, mark targets, and simulate the procedure before the first incision.
step2.detailed_p: The GuideOs platform offers exclusive planning tools. Perform measurements, set angles, draw contours, and segment structures with high precision to optimize and streamline the surgical procedure.

step3.title: Perform Registration
step3.p: Correlate the patient's anatomy on the surgical table with the 3D model, ensuring the system's accuracy.
step3.detailed_p: Registration for neurosurgery is a two-step process: first, capture 3 fiducial points on both the patient and the scan. Then, a surface registration with 10 random points in the area of interest refines the system's accuracy.

step4.title: Start Navigating
step4.p: Perform the surgery with the confidence of seeing the exact position of your instruments in real-time.
step4.detailed_p: Navigate in real-time with 6 simultaneous views (3D, Parallel, Orthogonal, Axial, Coronal, and Sagittal) for superior spatial awareness. Use real-time segmentation to easily identify anatomical structures of interest.

aboutUs.title: Our Origin: Innovation and Excellence
aboutUs.intro: BMT was born from the union of brilliant minds from the University of São Paulo (USP) in São Carlos, in collaboration with the EESC's Aerotech Innovation Laboratory and the Ribeirão Preto Clinical Hospital. We are proudly based in the São Carlos Technology Park and hold the DNA USP seal, a symbol of cutting-edge research and technology at the service of health.
